Text:
When two brothers, Jake and Andrew, are attacked one night by a monster their lives are changed forever.  Jake, is bitten on his arm during the attack and when he wakes up the next morning, itâs transformed into a super-strong monster arm.  Realising that monsters have overrun their town, the brothers set out to solve where they came from and stop them once and for all.

Written by Christopher Leone and Laura Harkcom, creators of the TV series The Lost Room, with art by Brian Churilla (The Anchor).

Released on  http://ComicPirates.info
